=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) Review Date: 2020/08/12 Store: OLEWELL Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Review Text: Got it for my girls!

It’s thick and not heavy and it doesn’t hurt as much! It won’t break easily and colored ones are cute pastel and the black ones are just as nice for adults

Good quality Review Title: Good quality! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms ASP ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.'] {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'} I just got this product at a beauty supply!

I love it!!! First time trying and it turned out awesome!!!!

I'm no a nail technician, or any sort of professional but it worked great, I did short, next time I'll do longer, after creating the nail I designed with some crystals!

So much cheaper, and I can do whatever I like going to a nail salon again!! I wish I knew this trick before! JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof JDO {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I was not very impressed.. it acts just like a regular cheap mascara, nothing impressive about it. Didn’t notice much difference than regular mascaras BFWood BFWood {'Brand': 'BFWood', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Package Dimensions': '9.92 x 9.45 x 1.85 inches; 5.08 Ounces'} It’s a good brush, firm and sturdy but it does hurt the scalp a little bit, it’s good for brushing but it can hurt! It’s not very flexible. Firm brush 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE PURELEOR {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} So while most magnetic eyeliners requires 2-3 min to dry, this one takes 20 to 30 seconds!

Such a nice kit, 5 pairs of different sizes and thickness lashes, very good quality.
This kit is worth the price and benefits of it! I’m excited with this kit! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Beauty and Hair Enthusiast**: In addition to a strong focus on DIY beauty solutions, particularly nail care and enhancement, the user has expanded their interests to include hair accessories, showcasing a broader approach to personal grooming. 
- **Critical Review of Products**: The user's evolving purchasing behavior continues to reflect a discerning attitude, now extended to hair care products that prioritize comfort and effectiveness, indicating heightened expectations regarding performance.
- **Cost-Conscious**: While the user consistently values affordability in beauty and hair purchases, they now also assess product quality, seeking budget-friendly options that do not compromise performance and reliability.
- **Creative Expression**: The user continues to enjoy customizing both nails and hair with various products, maintaining a focus on creative and artistic expression while searching for dependable solutions that support their endeavors.
- **Novice to Moderate Skill Level**: The user remains enthusiastic about learning new techniques but has intensified their scrutiny of products, focusing on those that deliver tangible results.
- **Desire for Convenience and Performance**: The appreciation for easy-to-use products with clear instructions persists, but the user now prioritizes performance and quality, as reflected in their satisfaction with recent purchases that combine quick results with a pleasant user experience. 

Overall, this user is a creative, cost-conscious beauty and hair enthusiast who is becoming increasingly selective about product quality, particularly in terms of comfort and effectiveness, while continuing to enjoy exploring DIY approaches.
